pqc_capability_description: Implements HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic) and ML-KEM for .NET platform. Provides quantum-resistant key exchange mechanisms with good performance characteristics on .NET runtime.
product_brief: C# implementation of cryptographic algorithms for .NET platform with PQC interoperability support.

pqc_capability_description: Comprehensive PQC implementation supporting ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA, and HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic). Provides quantum-resistant key encapsulation and digital signatures through JCE/JCA provider. Supports hybrid classical/PQC modes for gradual migration.
product_brief: Comprehensive Java implementation of cryptographic algorithms. Supports JCE/JCA provider lightweight API PGP S/MIME DTLS TLS OCSP TSP CMP and certificate generation.

pqc_capability_description: Long-term support release with ML-DSA composite signatures, enabling hybrid quantum-classical signature schemes. Allows organizations to use both traditional (RSA/ECDSA) and post-quantum signatures simultaneously for defense-in-depth.
product_brief: Long-term support release with enterprise stability. Includes PQC support and supply chain transparency features.

pqc_capability_description: Full support for NIST-standardized PQC algorithms including ML-KEM (Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism) for key exchange, ML-DSA (Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Algorithm) for signatures, and SLH-DSA (Stateless Hash-Based Digital Signature Algorithm). Enables quantum-safe TLS 1.3 connections with hybrid mode support.
product_brief: Robust commercial-grade TLS/SSL and crypto library. Implements TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 and QUIC protocols. Reference implementation for cryptographic operations used by majority of HTTPS websites.

pqc_capability_description: Multi-language library (C++, Go, Java) supporting FIPS 204/205 signatures. ML-KEM in progress. Used in Google infrastructure and Cloud KMS.
product_brief: Google's multi-language crypto library designed for safe and simple API usage. Integrating full PQC suite.

pqc_capability_description: C++ cryptography library with extensive PQC support recommended by BSI. Includes McEliece, FrodoKEM, and NIST standard algorithms.
product_brief: Feature-rich C++ crypto library. BSI project for PQC reference implementations.

pqc_capability_description: FIPS 140-3 validated cryptographic modules. Supports hybrid mode (classical + PQC) and includes CryptoComply PQ TLS for quantum-safe data in transit. Drop-in OpenSSL compatibility.
product_brief: Enterprise cryptographic modules with immediate PQC support and FIPS validation.

pqc_capability_description: Version 8.6 introduces quantum-safe TLS 1.3 with hybrid key exchange (X25519MLKEM768). Integrates liboqs implementations of ML-KEM and ML-DSA.
product_brief: SAP's proprietary cryptographic library now enabling PQC for SAP applications and secure communications.

pqc_capability_description: Comprehensive SDK for PQC integration. Features PQCryptoLib-Core (FIPS 140-3 certified) and PQCryptoLib-Soft. Supports mobile, server, and embedded.
product_brief: High-assurance post-quantum cryptography SDK for enterprise and embedded security.

pqc_capability_description: Native ML-KEM-768 and ML-KEM-1024 implementation in Go 1.24+ standard library. FIPS 203 compliant and validated as part of Go FIPS module.
product_brief: Standard library implementation of NIST FIPS 203 key encapsulation.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 203 ML-KEM. Modular, zero-unsafe code (mostly), and part of the RustCrypto organization.
product_brief: Pure Rust ML-KEM implementation standardizing on FIPS 203.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 204 ML-DSA signatures. Provides highly modular and type-safe interface for next-gen digital signatures.
product_brief: Pure Rust ML-DSA implementation compliant with FIPS 204.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 205 SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) hash-based signatures. suitable for high-security applications requiring conservative security assumptions.
product_brief: Pure Rust SLH-DSA implementation compliant with FIPS 205.

pqc_capability_description: Rust bindings to PQClean C implementations. Access to a wide range of NIST PQC candidates and standardized algorithms.
product_brief: Rust wrapper around PQClean providing FFI bindings to reference implementations.

pqc_capability_description: High-level Rust wrapper for liboqs C library. Provides safe abstractions for NIST PQC algorithms supported by the Open Quantum Safe project.
product_brief: Official Rust bindings for the Open Quantum Safe library.

pqc_capability_description: Formally verified and optimized C/Assembly implementation of ML-KEM. Part of Linux Foundation PQCA PQ Code Package. Proven memory safety and functional correctness.
product_brief: High-assurance production-ready ML-KEM implementation formally verified for correctness.

pqc_capability_description: Minimal functionality cryptographic library for bare-metal embedded systems. Now includes HQC and SHA-3/SHAKE PQC primitives.
product_brief: Lean crypto library optimized for small footprint embedded environments.

pqc_capability_description: Implementation of ETSI TS 104 015 Quantum-Safe Hybrid Key Exchanges with Hidden Access Policies. Enables attribute-based encryption (ABE) with post-quantum security.
product_brief: Attribute-based encryption with quantum resistance, compliant with ETSI TS 104 015.

pqc_capability_description: Library for benchmarking and testing PQC on ARM Cortex-M4 microcontrollers. Contains optimized implementations of ML-KEM
product_brief: https://github.com/mupq/pqm4
verification_status: Testing and benchmarking framework for PQC on embedded ARM Cortex-M4 devices.

pqc_capability_description: NIST-selected backup Key Encapsulation Mechanism (March 2025). Code-based cryptography offering an alternative to lattice-based ML-KEM.
product_brief: Reference implementation of the Hamming Quasi-Cyclic (HQC) KEM.

pqc_capability_description: Rust library for Citadel Protocol with multi-layered encryption and anti-replay protection. Features novel 3D matrix ratcheting and scramcryption.
product_brief: PQC library for Citadel Protocol with built-in anti-replay and ratcheting.

pqc_capability_description: Core cryptographic library for Windows Azure and Microsoft 365. Now integrated with ML-KEM and XMSS stateful signatures. Undergoing FIPS 140-3 validation for PQC module.
product_brief: Microsoft's core crypto library powering Windows Azure and O365. Optimized for performance and FIPS compliance.

pqc_capability_description: AWS's open-source crypto library derived from BoringSSL. First to achieve FIPS 140-3 validation for ML-KEM. Powers AWS KMS Secrets Manager and Certificate Manager.
product_brief: FIPS 140-3 validated crypto library for AWS services. Includes optimized ML-KEM and ML-DSA.

pqc_capability_description: GPU-accelerated PQC library for high-throughput workloads. Achieves 500x speedup over CPU for Kyber/ML-KEM. Essential for AI/ML security and high-performance computing.
product_brief: GPU-accelerated PQC SDK. Delivers massive throughput for ML-KEM and ML-DSA on Nvidia hardware.

pqc_capability_description: Implementation of RFC 8784 for quantum-safe IKEv2/IPsec using Post-Quantum Preshared Keys (PPKs). Protects VPNs against Harvest Now Decrypt Later attacks.
product_brief: Quantum-safe IPsec VPN support using Post-Quantum Preshared Keys (PPKs).

pqc_capability_description: Application Layer Transport Security with hybrid post-quantum key exchange (NTRU-HRSS + X25519). Protections Google's internal infrastructure traffic against quantum decryption.
product_brief: Google's internal transport security protocol now hardened with hybrid PQC.

pqc_capability_description: Groundbreaking iMessage protocol (PQ3) achieving Level 3 security with hybrid ML-KEM. CoreCrypto library provides system-level PQC for iOS/macOS including ML-KEM and ML-DSA APIs.
product_brief: First messaging protocol to achieve Level 3 security with separate PQC rekeying. System-wide PQC support in Apple ecosystem.

pqc_capability_description: Leverages Thales Luna HSM PQC capabilities. Microsoft Azure offers quantum-safe HSM services for enterprise customers requiring hardware-backed PQC key storage.
product_brief: Thales Luna HSMs deployed in Azure datacenters for customer-exclusive use.

pqc_capability_description: Hybrid classical/PQC mode support. Enables organizations to run dual-mode cryptographic operations combining RSA/ECC with PQC algorithms for gradual migration in regulated environments.
product_brief: Enterprise HSM solution with CodeSafe secure execution environment. Supports hybrid classical/PQC modes.

pqc_capability_description: PQC-ready hardware security module. Thales roadmap includes full support for NIST-standardized PQC algorithms with hardware acceleration. Critical for high-security key storage.
product_brief: Enterprise HSM management software for Luna Network and PCIe HSMs. FIPS 140-3 Level 3 certified.

pqc_capability_description: PQC roadmap includes support for NIST algorithms. German HSM vendor positioning for post-quantum transition in European markets and critical infrastructure.
product_brief: General purpose HSM platform for enterprise cryptographic operations and key management.

pqc_capability_description: Limited hybrid PQC support in key management operations. AWS is gradually rolling out quantum-safe capabilities across KMS to protect customer encryption keys against future quantum threats.
product_brief: Managed service for creating and controlling encryption keys. Integrates with AWS services.

pqc_capability_description: Experimental support for SLH-DSA in Transit secrets engine. Enables quantum-resistant encryption-as-a-service for protecting data in transit. Early adoption in enterprise secrets management.
product_brief: Enterprise secrets management encryption-as-a-service and privileged access management. Supports PKI SSH transit encryption.

pqc_capability_description: PKI software with PQC support via Bouncy Castle integration. Can issue X.509 certificates with quantum-resistant signatures (ML-DSA) and support hybrid certificate chains.
product_brief: Enterprise PKI and Certificate Authority software. Supports X.509 CMP SCEP EST ACME protocols.

pqc_capability_description: Commercial PKI platform with full PQC certificate lifecycle management. Supports quantum-safe certificate issuance, renewal, and revocation for enterprise PKI infrastructure.
product_brief: Commercial enterprise PKI platform with cloud deployment HSM integration and crypto agility features.

pqc_capability_description: Crypto agility features enable PQC algorithm management across enterprise certificate infrastructure. Automated discovery and migration planning for quantum-safe PKI transition.
product_brief: Machine identity management platform. Automates certificate lifecycle across enterprise infrastructure.

pqc_capability_description: AWS TLS implementation with Kyber hybrid key exchange. Used across AWS services to provide quantum-safe communications. Designed for high-performance cloud environments.
product_brief: AWS's C99 implementation of TLS/SSL protocols. Designed for simplicity security and performance. Small codebase (~6000 lines).

pqc_capability_description: Google's fork with ML-KEM support. Used in Chrome browser and Google infrastructure. Pioneering deployment of quantum-safe key exchange at internet scale.
product_brief: Google's fork of OpenSSL optimized for Google's needs. Not intended for general use but influences industry standards.

pqc_capability_description: Supports ML-KEM with X25519 hybrid key exchange (X25519MLKEM768) and ML-DSA signatures via liboqs and leancrypto integration. Enables quantum-safe TLS in GNU/Linux applications.
product_brief: GNU implementation of TLS SSL and DTLS protocols. Features SRP X.509 OpenPGP authentication. Used by many GNU/Linux applications.

pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM 768/1024 imported from BoringSSL - not yet public API)
pqc_capability_description: Imported ML-KEM 768 and 1024 from BoringSSL. PQC support currently in development, not yet exposed in public API but demonstrates OpenBSD's commitment to quantum-safe cryptography.
product_brief: OpenBSD fork of OpenSSL focused on code modernization and security. Includes libtls for simplified secure programming.

pqc_capability_description: Memory-safe TLS library with PQC support via aws-lc-rs (AWS libcrypto for Rust). Enables quantum-resistant TLS in Rust applications with zero unsafe code.
product_brief: Modern TLS library written in Rust. Memory-safe alternative to OpenSSL. No unsafe code in core library.

pqc_capability_description: Embedded-focused TLS library with ML-DSA, ML-KEM, and Kyber support. Optimized for resource-constrained environments like IoT devices and embedded systems. Enables quantum-safe communications in automotive, industrial, and edge computing.
primary_platforms: Embedded Linux Windows RTOS ESP32 STM32
product_brief: Lightweight portable TLS/SSL library for embedded devices to cloud. Supports TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 with small footprint. Includes wolfCrypt crypto engine.

pqc_capability_description: Digital signing platform with PQC support via modules. Can create quantum-resistant signatures for documents, code, and timestamps using ML-DSA and other PQC algorithms.
product_brief: Open source signing platform. Supports various signature formats and HSM integration.

pqc_capability_description: IPsec VPN with experimental ML-KEM support. Enables quantum-safe VPN tunnels for site-to-site and remote access scenarios. Active development for production deployment.
product_brief: Open source IPsec-based VPN solution supporting IKEv1 IKEv2 and various authentication methods.

pqc_capability_description: Signal's approach includes PQXDH and SPQR Ratchet for quantum-resistant messaging combining X25519
license: and double-ratchet protocol for forward secrecy.
product_brief: https://signal.org/docs/
verification_status: Double Ratchet protocol providing end-to-end encryption with forward secrecy and post-compromise security.

pqc_capability_description: Default key exchange now uses mlkem768x25519-sha256 hybrid PQC. Combines ML-KEM-768 with X25519 elliptic curve for quantum-resistant SSH connections. First major SSH implementation to deploy PQC by default.
product_brief: Premier connectivity tool for SSH protocol. Provides secure tunneling multiple authentication methods. Default key exchange now uses mlkem768x25519-sha256 hybrid PQC.

pqc_capability_description: SSH implementation with Kyber and Ed25519 hybrid support. Provides quantum-resistant secure shell connections for embedded systems and IoT devices.
product_brief: Small fast portable SSH implementation with SCP and SFTP support. Designed for embedded and resource-constrained environments.

pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM ML-DSA SLH-DSA BIKE HQC FrodoKEM Classic McEliece)
pqc_capability_description: Reference implementation library from Open Quantum Safe project. Comprehensive support for NIST-standardized algorithms (ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA) plus additional candidates including BIKE, HQC, FrodoKEM, and Classic McEliece. Serves as foundation for integrating PQC into applications and protocols.
product_brief: Open source C library for quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms. Part of Open Quantum Safe project under Linux Foundation PQCA.

pqc_capability_description: OpenSSL 3 provider enabling quantum-safe cryptography in TLS 1.3, X.509 certificates, and CMS operations. Supports all liboqs algorithms and enables hybrid key exchange combining classical ECDH with PQC KEMs. Critical for quantum-safe TLS deployments.
product_brief: OpenSSL 3 provider enabling quantum-safe and hybrid key exchange for TLS 1.3 X.509 and CMS operations.

pqc_capability_description: Protocol analyzer with PQC detection capabilities. Can scan servers and identify quantum-safe cipher suites, key exchange algorithms, and certificate types. Essential for PQC deployment verification.
product_brief: Fast SSL/TLS scanning library. Analyzes server configurations.

pqc_capability_description: Command-line TLS testing tool with PQC detection. Helps security teams audit TLS configurations for quantum-safe readiness and identify legacy cryptography.
product_brief: Command-line TLS/SSL testing tool. Checks protocols ciphers and vulnerabilities.

pqc_capability_description: Cryptographic security analysis platform with PQC readiness assessment. Discovers existing crypto usage, identifies quantum-vulnerable implementations, and provides migration recommendations.
product_brief: Cryptographic security analysis platform. Discovers crypto usage and vulnerabilities.

pqc_capability_description: Purpose-built quantum-safe security toolkit. Core focus on PQC migration with algorithm agility, hybrid modes, and enterprise integration. Comprehensive solution for organizational PQC transition.
product_brief: Quantum-safe security toolkit. Enables smooth PQC transition.

pqc_capability_description: Secure bootloader with ML-DSA signature verification. Ensures firmware integrity using quantum-resistant digital signatures, critical for long-lived embedded devices and IoT.
product_brief: Universal secure bootloader with HSM integration and PQC support (ML-DSA). Suitable for IoT automotive and aerospace applications.

pqc_capability_description: General availability of PQC algorithms in November 2025 update. Supports ML-KEM and ML-DSA via CNG and Certificate functions.
repository_url: Microsoft's latest server OS with native PQC support via CNG.
product_brief: Trusted Vendor

pqc_capability_description: Native API support for quantum-resistant cryptography including PQ3 and TSPHINCS+. Upgraded TLS 1.3 and Adiantum v2 for data at rest protection.
product_brief: Next-gen Android OS with native PQC APIs and updated TLS 1.3.

pqc_capability_description: System-wide PQC support including PQ3 for iMessage and HPKE with ML-KEM/ML-DSA. APIs for third-party apps via CryptoKit.
product_brief: Apple's latest OS releases with comprehensive system-level PQC support.

pqc_capability_description: Supports RFC 8784 for Post-Quantum using Pre-Shared Keys (PPK) in IKEv2. Protects VPN traffic against quantum threats.
repository_url: Network OS with RFC 8784 support for quantum-safe IKEv2.
product_brief: Verified

pqc_capability_description: PAN-OS 12.1 Orion release supports NIST standard PQC algorithms (ML-KEM ML-DSA). Features automated cipher translation and quantum-optimized hardware acceleration.
repository_url: Next-gen firewall OS with specialized PQC hardware acceleration and cipher translation.
product_brief: Trusted Vendor

pqc_capability_description: FortiOS 7.6.5 introduces quantum-safe IPsec and agentless VPN capabilities. Native integration for protecting against HNDL attacks.
product_brief: Security-driven OS with native PQC IPsec and VPN support.

pqc_capability_description: R82.10 release features robust post-quantum VPN capabilities leveraging Kyber/ML-KEM. Hybrid post-quantum key exchange for IKEv2.
product_brief: Firewall software with hybrid quantum-safe VPN key exchange.

pqc_capability_description: Meta-library providing a unified API for crypto agility. Uses liboqs backend to support wide range of PQC algorithms.
product_brief: Crypto-agility library with unified API and liboqs backend.

pqc_capability_description: Cloudflare Interoperable Reusable Cryptographic Library. Optimized Go implementation of ML-KEM and ML-DSA.
repository_url: Cloudflare's advanced crypto library for Go, specializing in PQC experiments.
product_brief: Open Source

pqc_capability_description: WireGuard tunnels with post-quantum protection enabled by default (v2025.14). Uses ML-KEM PSK for hybrid quantum resistance.
product_brief: Privacy-focused VPN with default post-quantum WireGuard tunnels.

pqc_capability_description: Proprietary Lightway protocol integrated with ML-KEM for hybrid post-quantum protection. High performance UDP/TCP VPN protocol.
product_brief: Lightway protocol now upgraded with ML-KEM for quantum safety.

pqc_capability_description: TutaCrypt protocol uses Kyber-based hybrid encryption for emails. Protections against Harvest Now Decrypt Later attacks for all new accounts.
product_brief: Encrypted email service using TutaCrypt (Kyber hybrid) protocol.

pqc_capability_description: Analytics and SDK platform for crypto inventory and agility. Enables automated discovery and migration to PQC without code changes.
product_brief: Crypto agility platform for discovery, inventory, and automated remediation.

pqc_capability_description: First HSM to receive PCI HSM validation with PQC support. Supports ML-DSA and ML-KEM for financial and enterprise security.
product_brief: PCI HSM validated Hardware Security Module with native PQC support.
